Export.Routine: INDRUCKEDI2 ;INDRUCKEDI2;DT;DRUCKEN ANSCHRIFT EDI;19.06.2002 ; Compiled January 18, 2005 14:36:14 ; ;/------------------------------------------------------------------\ ;| Description of Function : ;| DRUCKEN ANSCHRIFT EDI ;| ;| Inputs : ;| ;| ;| ByRef : ;| ;| ;| Returns : ;| ;| ;| History : ;| ;| DT 19.06.2002 ;| ;\------------------------------------------------------------------/ ; NEW YKUNDEX,YADRESX SET YKUNDEX=YKUNDE ;ZWISCHENSPEICHERN SET YADRESX=YADRES IF $PIECE($GET(YVERBAND1),Y,71)=1 DO ;VERBAND ERHÃ„LT RECHNUNG ;ligature tab . SET YKUNDE=YVERBAND . SET YADRES=YVERBAND1 . QUIT SET QUAL="SE" IF YBELEG=3 SET QUAL="BY" ;BESTELLUNG ;sales order IF YBELEG=10 SET QUAL="BY" ;ANFRAGE IF YBELEG=13 SET QUAL="BY" ;BEST. STORNO DO EDI^INDRUCK("NAD+"_QUAL_"+++"_$PIECE(YADRES,Y,4)_":"_$PIECE(YADRES,Y,6)_":"_$PIECE(YADRES,Y,7)_"+"_$PIECE(YADRES,Y,10)_"+"_$PIECE(YADRES,Y,16)_"+"_$PIECE(YADRES,Y,12)_"++"_$PIECE(YADRES,Y,17)) SET YKUNDE=YKUNDEX ;ZURUECK SET YADRES=YADRESX QUIT ; ; SET YKUNDE=YKUNDEX ;ZURUECK SET YADRES=YADRESX QUIT
